alert.note: Alert for Langlade (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln, northeastern Marathon and west central Langlade Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp, or 21 miles north of Wausau, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Merrill, Council Grounds State Park and Dutch Corners around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Glandon, Heafford Junction, Ackley Wildlife Area, Bradley, Dudley, Nutterville, Otis, Sunset, Mccord and Otter Lake Campground. Minor street flooding is possible in Merrill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
